description: This file contains implementation of a component object for BSP engine access, including creation, initialization, and removal functions for a string component object, with functions for constructing and destroying the object, and setting up its methods.
external_files: some memory management functions (e.g., AnscAllocateMemory, AnscFreeMemory)

classes.name: BSP_TEMPLATE_ACCESS_OBJECT
classes.description: Struct representing the string component object with member functions for initialize, remove, output, member, and value.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE BspTemplateAccessCOCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new instance of the component object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BspTemplateAccessCORemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Deletes the component object and frees associated memory.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BspTemplateAccessCOInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the component object by setting function pointers for its methods.
